testcase.purpose: Check if CSS styles declared in enclosing tree are not be applied in a shadow tree if the apply-author-styles flag is set to false
Check if the attribute return the current value of the applyAuthorStyles flag
Check if the resetStyleInheritance continue to inherit CSS styles if the apply-author-styles flag is set to false
Check if the attribute return the current value of the resetStyleInheritance flag
Check if activeElement attribute of the ShadowRoot must return the currently focused element in the shadow tree
Check if activeElement attribute of the ShadowRoot must return null if there's no focused element
Check if innerHTML attribute of the ShadowRoot return the current value of the resetStyleInheritance flag
Check if innerHTML attribute replace all content of the ShadowRoot object
Check if styleSheets attribute return the shadow root style sheets
Check if ShadowRoot getElementById() return child element
Check if ShadowRoot getElementsByClassName() return matching child element
Check if ShadowRoot getElementsByTagNameNS() return matching child element
Check if getSelection() method of the shadow root object return the current selection in this shadow tree
Check if ShadowRoot getElementsByTagName() return matching child element
Check if elementFromPoint method return null If x argument of elementFromPoint(x, y) is less than zero
Check if attribute pseudo return the current custom pseudo-element value
Check if Pseudo-element style be discarded by new setter
Check if attribute shadowRoot return the youngest tree that has the context object as its shadow host
Check if attribute shadowRoot return null if no shadow tree is accesible
Check if createShadowRoot() method create new instance of ShadowRoot object
Check if createShadowRoot() method establish the context object as the shadow host of the ShadowRoot object
Check if the value of the type attribute is HOST_RULE, then the object that implements this interface must implement CSSHostRule interface
Check if element is rendered if select is vaild
Check if element is not rendered if select is invaild
Check if element is rendered if resetStyleInheritance is vaild
Check if element is not rendered if resetStyleInheritance is invaild
Check if getDistributedNodes method return a NodeLIst consisting of nodes
Check if fallback content of html content element can be rendered
Check if element is rendered if resetStyleInheritance is vaild
Check if element is not rendered if resetStyleInheritance is invaild
Check if olderShadowRoot is null if shadow tree does not exist
Check if element is not rendered if olderShadowRoot is invalid
Check if fallback content of html shadow element can be rendered
Check if the path attribute return the adjusted event path
Check if on setting, the attribute must set the value of the apply-author-styles flag for the shadow host's tree to specified value
Check if on setting, the attribute must set the value of the reset-style-inheritance flag for the shadow host's tree to specified value
Check if on getting, the attribute must return the result of running the HTML fragment serialization algorithm with the context object as shadow host
Check if the nodeType attribute of a ShadowRoot instance must return DOCUMENT_FRAGMENT_NODE
Check if the nodeName attribute of a ShadowRoot instance must return #document-fragment
Check if invoking the cloneNode() method on a ShadowRoot instance must always throw a DATA_CLONE_ERR exception
Check if on getting, the attribute must return empty string if there is no part pseudo-element associated with this element
Check if on getting, the attribute must return the list of all CSS rules
Check if the method must insert a CSS rule rule into the CSS rule list returned by cssRules at index when invoked
Check if the method must remove a CSS rule rule from the CSS rule list returned by cssRules at index when invoked
Check if the Event target and currentTarget attributes must return the relative target for the node on which event listeners are invoked
Check if the MouseEvent relatedTarget attribute must return the adjusted related target
Check if the following events must always be stopped at abort which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at error which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at select which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at change which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at load which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at reset which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at resize which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at scroll which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the following events must always be stopped at selectstart which is the nearest shadow boundary
Check if the DOMFocusIn events must be treated in the same way as events with a relatedTarget
Check if the blur events must be treated in the same way as events with a relatedTarget
Check if the focus events must be treated in the same way as events with a relatedTarget
Check if for a given node, the relatedTarget must be changed to its ancestor (or self) that is in the same shadow tree as the node
Check if the mutation event types must never be dispatched in a shadow DOM subtree
Check if the implementation of Retargeting algorithm is valid
Check if the shadow host styles being inherited by the children of the shadow root must also apply to CSS Variables
Check if the declarations of the rules in a at host at-rule must only be matched against the shadow host of the shadow tree in which the style is specified
Check if each shadow root has an associated list of zero or more style sheets which is named shadow root style sheets
Check if the styles of the shadow host are inherited by the children of the shadow root
Check if the styles of the insertion point nodes are inherited by those child nodes of the shadow host that are assigned to this insertion point
Check if the styles of the shadow insertion point node are inherited by the child nodes of the shadow root of the shadow tree which is distributed to this shadow insertion point
Check if the reset-style-inheritance flag is set for a shadow tree, all inheritable CSS properties must behave as if they were explicitly set to the initial value at the upper boundary of the tree

Check if the reset-style-inheritance flag is set for an insertion point in a shadow tree, all inheritable CSS properties must behave as if they were explicitly set to the initial value at the lower boundary of the tree
Check if the selection, returned by the window.getSelection() method must never return a selection within a shadow tree
Check if the getSelection() method of the shadow root object must return the current selection in this shadow tree
Check if each shadow root must also have an activeElement property to store the value of the focused element in the shadow tree
Check if document's activeElement property must be adjusted
Check if shadow trees must not be propagated contentEditable attribute from shadow host
Check if the navigation order within a shadow tree must be computed as a list of focusable elements in tree order as-rendered with the exception of any elements

Check if for sequential focus navigation, the shadow DOM navigation order sequence must be inserted into the document navigation order in place of the shadow host as if the shadow host were assigned the value of auto for determining its position and shadow host is not focusable
Check if the navigation order within a shadow tree must be computed as a list of focusable elements in tree order

Check if for sequential focus navigation, the shadow DOM navigation order sequence must be inserted into the document navigation order immediately after the shadow host, if the shadow host is focusable
Check if throw an InvalidNodeTypeError, if context object is not a ShadowRoot instance
Check if on getting return the older shadow root relative to the root node of the context object if shadow root is accessible
Check if on getting return null if no such shadow root is accessible
Check if the relatedTarget and target are the same for a given node, its the event listeners must not be invoked
Check if event listeners must not be invoked on a node for which the target and relatedTarget are the same
Check if the element can have fallback content and UA should allow the shadow tree to contain at least one insertion point
Check if Elements that have no fallback content should allow the shadow tree to contain no insertion points or an insertion point that matches nothing
Check if fieldset can contain at least two insertion points with matching criteria legend:first-of-type and universal selector
Check if details can contain at least two insertion points with matching criteria summary:first-of-type and universal selector
Check if form elements and form-associated elements in shadow tree are not accessible using document DOM object's tree accessors
Check if form elements and form-associated elements in shadow tree must be accessible using shadow tree accessors
Check if form should submit elements in shadow tree
Check if base element must behave as inert, or not part of the document tree
Check if link element must behave as inert not as part of the document tree
Check if the implementation of Composition algorithm is valid
Check if a valid selector fragment may contain a type selector
Check if a valid selector fragment may contain a universal selector
Check if a valid selector fragment may contain a class selector
Check if a valid selector fragment may contain a ID selector
Check if a valid selector fragment may contain a attribute selector
